metadata.title: CVE-2024-26625 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: llc:call sock_orphan() at release time syzbot reported an interesting trace [1]caused by a stale sk->sk_wq pointer in a closed llc socket. In commitff7b11aa481f ("net: socket: set sock->sk to NULL after callingproto_ops::release()") Eric Biggers hinted that some protocols are missinga sock_orphan(), we need to perform a full audit.
